4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='EQUAL, NOT_EQUAL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapNL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT, METHOD_REF'/>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, LPAREN'/>
        <property name='option' value='EOL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='typecastIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='arrayInitWrap' value='false'/>
        <property name='lineWrapping' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.1 Vertical Whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='EmptyLineSeparator'>
        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PACKAGE_DEF, IMPORT, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT'/>
    </module>
    <module name='EmptyLineSeparator'>
        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='VARIABLE_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='EQUAL, NOT_EQUAL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapNL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT, METHOD_REF'/>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, LPAREN'/>
        <property name='option' value='EOL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.3 Horizontal alignment: never requir:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, EQUAL'/>
        <property name='option' value='no'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.6 Comments:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='Comments'>
        <property name='id' value='Comments'/>
        <property name='format' value='ALLOWED'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PACKAGE_DEF, IMPORT, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, PARAMETERS, LAMBDA, LAMBDA_PARAMETERS, RESOURCE_SPECIFICATION, RESOURCE, EXCEPTION_PARAMETER, LABELED_STATEMENT, CASE_GROUP, CASE_LABEL, SWITCH_BLOCK, CATCH_CLAUSE, LAMBDA_BODY, TYPECAST, CONDITIONAL, FOR_INIT, FOR_ITERATOR, ARRAY_INIT, STATIC_IMPORT, ANNOTATION_MEMBER_VALUE_PAIR, ANNOTATION_ARRAY_INIT, ANNOTATION_DEF_DEFAULT, ANNOTATION_MEMBER_VALUE_PAIRS, ANNOTATION_MEMBER_VALUE_PAIRS_DEFAULT, ANNOTATION_MEMBER_VALUE_PAIRS_ARRAY_INIT, ANNOTATION_MEMBER_VALUE_PAIRS_ARRAY_INIT_DEFAULT'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.6.1 Block comment style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='CommentsIndentation'>
        <property name='eachLine' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='indent'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='BLOCK_COMMENT, LINE_COMMENT'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='ModifierOrder'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PUBLIC, PROTECTED, PRIVATE, ABSTRACT, DEFAULT, STATIC, FINAL, TRANSIENT, VOLATILE, SYNCHRONIZED, NATIVE, STRICTFP'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.1 Package names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='PackageName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z0-9]+(\\.[a-z0-9]+)*$'/>
        <property name='illegalFormat' value='^[A-Z]|[_]'/>
        <property name='message' value='Package name must be in lowercase and not contain underscores'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.3 Method names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='MethodName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='id' value='methodName'/>
        <property name='severity' value='warning'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.8 Type variable names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='TypeName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='ignoreCase' value='false'/>
    </module>
    <module name='TypeName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*T$'/>
        <property name='ignoreCase' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
